title: Unravelling the ecotoxicological impacts of gadolinium (Gd) on Mytilus galloprovincialis embryos and sperm in seawater: A preliminary study
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Marisa Spampinato, Antonietta Siciliano, Angela Travaglione, Teresa Chianese, Aldo Mileo, Giovanni Libralato, Marco Guida, Marco Trifuoggi, Vincenza De Gregorio, Luigi Rosati
